mapper.select: SELECT userID,CART.bbsID,amount,title,price FROM SHOPPING.CART, SHOPPING.BBS WHERE CART.bbsID = BBS.bbsID AND userID = #{userID} AND isOrder = 1

SELECT * FROM SHOPPING.ITEMORDER, (SELECT ORDERID,BBS.bbsID,amount,BBS.price,title from SHOPPING.ORDERITEMS,SHOPPING.BBS WHERE ORDERITEMS.bbsID=BBS.bbsID) AS ITEM WHERE userID = #{userID} AND ITEMORDER.orderID=ITEM.orderID GROUP BY ITEM.orderID ORDER BY bbsID DESC LIMIT #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

SELECT * FROM SHOPPING.ITEMORDER, (SELECT ORDERID,BBS.bbsID,amount,BBS.price,title from SHOPPING.ORDERITEMS,SHOPPING.BBS WHERE ORDERITEMS.bbsID=BBS.bbsID) AS ITEM WHERE ITEMORDER.orderID=ITEM.orderID GROUP BY ITEM.orderID ORDER BY ITEMORDER.orderID DESC LIMIT #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
SELECT userID,CART.bbsID,amount,title,price FROM SHOPPING.CART, SHOPPING.BBS WHERE CART.bbsID = BBS.bbsID AND userID = #{userID} AND isOrder = 1
SELECT bbsID,amount FROM SHOPPING.ITEMORDER, SHOPPING.ORDERITEMS WHERE ITEMORDER.orderID = ORDERITEMS.orderID AND ITEMORDER.orderID = #{orderID}

SELECT userID,bbsID,title,price,amount,orderName,addr1,addr2,addr3,phoneNumber,orderMemo,delivery FROM SHOPPING.ITEMORDER, (SELECT orderID,BBS.bbsID,amount,BBS.price,title from SHOPPING.ORDERITEMS,SHOPPING.BBS WHERE ORDERITEMS.bbsID=BBS.bbsID) AS ITEM WHERE ITEMORDER.orderID=#{orderID} AND ITEMORDER.orderID=ITEM.orderID
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SHOPPING.ITEMORDER WHERE orderID = #{orderID} AND delivery = "상품준비중"
DELETE FROM SHOPPING.CART WHERE userID = #{userID} AND isOrder = 1
UPDATE SHOPPING.ITEMORDER SET orderName = #{orderName}, addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2}, addr3 = #{addr3}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}, orderMemo = #{orderMemo} WHERE orderID = #{orderID}
